Created attachment 34433 Test Case We recently changed the way we distribute out tag libraries, and now package them within a jar file. We have a nightly deploy and test. After this change the deployed server was working fine, but the test compilation of the tag library now fails. Attached is a cut-down test case that shows the issue. If you run ant -Dtomcat.dir=PATH_TO_TOMCAT7 you will see the error: build.xml:38: org.apache.jasper.JasperException: java.io.FileNotFoundException: /META-INF/tags/listitems.tagx If you take the same war file and deploy it, you can view the welcome page and the tag works as expected. You should see: Example of tagx file with self reference packaged in jar

You don't see this issue if the tagx is not recursive.
